title: "Fratelli Detective", an Egyptian font
content:
Hi,  
can you help us to identify this type?  
It's a test logo for an italian sit-com ("The Detective Brothers").  
Thanks a lot!

f

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021211937im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fratelliDetective1_6597.jpg)
author: franzlt

comments.content:
mmmh... look again... [Bullpen Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021211937/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/bullpen/UniqueName-10001-1237402881-26-90549/) looks pretty good to me ( see "R" ).

Nice find, Felix.
